parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attaches a script to a scripted waypoint. In early versions of Arma, command consisted of a script name and additional script arguments and the script had to use [[SQS]]-Syntax. The script receives the following arguments in [[_this]] variable: [group, position, target] + [the optional passed arguments]. The optional arguments are [[append]]ed to the end of the arguments array.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3</title><part><name index="1"/><value>In Arma 3, ''command'' argument can be a reference to .sqf script (it will have to explicitly end with '''.sqf''') or a reference to .sqs script.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint [[setWaypointScript]] command </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> command: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[setWaypointScript]] "find.sqs [[player]]";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[setWaypointScript]] "somescript.sqf [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8]";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypointSpeed]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
